## Diamonds

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(plotly)
library(ggplot2)
plot_ly(diamonds, x = ~clarity, y=~log(price), color = ~cut)


```

## Frequency polygons 

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

p <- ggplot(diamonds, aes(x = log(price), color = clarity)) + 
    geom_freqpoly(binwidth= 30)
ggplotly(p)
```
